word: ALLEGED FOREIGN TONGUE.--IN OTHER INSTANCES, WHEN ONE COMES INTO THIS BLESSING OF SPEAKING WITH TONGUES, THE LORD MAY GIVE ME THE SAME TONGUE, AND WE MAY HOLD A CONVERSATION IN THE LANGUAGE THAT THE SPIRIT OF GOD MAY HAVE GIVEN US UTTERANCE IN. EVEN THREE OR FOUR MAY TAKE PART IN THE CONVERSATION, AND YET IT IS A FOREIGN TONGUE TO THEM, AND ONE WAITS ON THE OTHER UNTIL THE OTHER IS THROUGH; AND IT IS ALL IN ORDER. THIS IS THE EXPERIENCE WE RECEIVED, ACCORDING TO THE PROMISED BLESSING. . . .
